thread.section_title: Lucky Tackle Box Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lucky Tackle Box | www.luckytacklebox.com
thread.title: Shane Green
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Shane Green

author: Shane Green
title: Shane Green
text: Where do I begin? LTB is by far the best box subscription out there. I've caught fish on every product sent to me. Even better than that, Mel and the whole customer service crew are second to none. If you ever have any questions the response time is amazing. I'm a loyal LTB subscriber and will be for life!!
